headline: Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP) Names New Strategic Advisor as Dividend is Affirmed
summary: Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP) announced a significant leadership transition with Beth Whited becoming a strategic advisor, following her tenure as the first female president. Additionally, the company declared a quarterly dividend of $1.34 per share, marking robust shareholder returns. Over the last month, the share price moved up by 4%, reflecting these strategic developments. This positive trajectory aligns with broader market trends where indexes have been fluctuating amid US-China trade talks...

headline: Union Pacific President Beth Whited Celebrates 37 Years with the Railroad and Announces Transition to Company Advisor
summary: OMAHA, Neb., May 09, 2025--Union Pacific Railroad President Beth Whited will transition from her role as the railroad’s first female president to become a strategic advisor effective July 1, 2025. Whited will remain an advisor through early 2026.
